title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When selecting the dynamic text content type, no changes or effects can be observed in the software.
EB: I expect that selecting the dynamic text content type should result in some visible changes or effects in the software interface or behavior.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the software. 2. Navigate to the content type settings. 3. Select the dynamic text content type. 4. Observe that no changes or effects occur in the software.
